attributes.action: Stop the closure of Abbeyhill Primary School & Nursery
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Abbeyhill Primary School and its nursery have been targeted for closure
by the City of Edinburgh Council. However the families of Abbeyhill will
fight this proposal every step of the way. We are determined to keep
this thriving and well-loved school a part of the local community
 in Edinburgh's Abbeyhill area.
